description:
This is part one of an ongoing series. 

Government involvement in content moderation raises serious human rights concerns in every context. Since October 7, social media platforms have been challenged for the unjustified takedowns of pro-Palestinian content—sometimes at the request of the Israeli government—and a simultaneous failure to remove hate speech towards Palestinians. More specifically, social media platforms have worked with the
title: Digital Apartheid in Gaza: Unjust Content Moderation at the Request of Israel’s Cyber Unit
